body.p: At this Term of the Estill Court Mr. Patric McMahon was fined the sum of $50 -- for carrying concealed a pistol, He has got up a petition signed by a number of good citizens -- The petition I believe set forths the facts of His case. I think it one that deserves the consideration of the Executive Gov. He is young and poor lately married and is Striving Hard to make an Honest support --

Respectfully
Your Obt Servt
John Dishman
